metadata.title: Sterling Silver Tiny Flower Diamond Stud Earrings Flawless Finish
features: These Tiny Flower Stud Earrings are Quality Crafted Gorgeous 7 mm Wide and come with Excellent Quality Genuine Diamonds to match
Tiny Silver Flower Stud Earrings with beautiful clear crisp detail.
Tiny Flower Stud Earrings 1/4 inch (7 mm) wide
Solid Sterling Silver hand polished with flawless shine Excellent Quality Gift you'd be proud to give
To keep your silver jewelry clean while not in use, it needs to be stored in an airtight container such as a zip lock baggie, away from rubber bands
description: These Tiny Flower Stud Earrings are solid Sterling Silver, beautifully designed with very nice clear crisp detail and all hand polished to a flawless polished silver shine with NO PLATING, and come with Excellent Quality Genuine Diamonds to match. A very classy pair of silver earrings you'd be proud to gift or wear, guaranteed to draw compliments. ***To keep your silver jewelry clean while not in use, it needs to be stored in an airtight container such as a zip lock baggie, away from rubber bands.***
